home.currentlyDoing: Studying at IES PUERTO DE LA CRUZ TELESFORO BRAVO

aboutme.title: About me
aboutme.introduction: Hello! I am a web development student passionate about programming and the digital world in general. I’m always eager to learn from mistakes in order to bring code closer to perfection

objectives.title: My objectives
objectives.text: Currently I’m living in Spain and as a web application development student, I aim to become a full-stack developer who can meet all the requirements to perform any task assigned to me in the best possible way.

mind.title: About working
mind.text: I believe in the power of teamwork and the necessity of collaboration, as it is the foundation of every project that successfully reaches its goal.

knowledge.title: About my knowledge
knowledge.text: Throughout my learning journey, I have worked with various tools of all kinds, including databases, frameworks, programming languages, and systems... If you're curious, feel free to check out my skills page.

project_1.title: JavaSpotify
project_1.description: A project for a music player in a browser made with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, although it is primarily a project to practice advanced CSS exclusively.

project_2.title: League Stats
project_2.description: A project to display the statistics of League of Legends champions by querying the official API; it is an advanced CSS project for practice.

project_3.title: Todo
project_3.description: A project made in Django (Python) that simulates a simple task manager.
project_3.tools: CSS, HTML, BOOTSTRAP, PYTHON, DJANGO, SQLITE3

project_4.title: Pokemon Store
project_4.description: A project that simulates a store where Pokémon can be purchased using a non-relational database (Firebase).

project_5.title: Tribu
project_5.description: A project that simulates a simple social network called Tribu, which includes profiles, posts, and comments.
project_5.tools: CSS, HTML, BOOTSTRAP, PYTHON, DJANGO, SQLITE3
